channel.title: Different walk paths?
channel.description: in a script im making, im trying to make it so there are a bunch of walk paths for complete randomness, i know i probably need to use arrays, but i have no idea how to, can anyone help? or is it like a:= random(15) if a= 1 then mouse() etc etc. wha twould be the best way to do this?

item.title: Different walk paths?
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

[quote=“nix, post:3, topic:12800”][quote author=Pyro link=topic=18976.msg216375#msg216375 date=1157420139]
i find cases work best.

[scar]
procedure walkpath1;
begin
end;

procedure walkpath2;
begin
end;

procedure walkpath;
begin
case random(2) of
0:walkpath1;
1:walkpath2;
end;
end;

[/scar]
[/quote]

sexy[/quote]
very sexy, much cleaner then mine

Read full topic
